# ðŸ“Š 2024 Tax Completion

> [!warning] **URGENT**: Tax season approaching - need CPA and accountant preparation ASAP

---

## ðŸŽ¯ Project Overview

### Objective
Complete 2024 tax preparation and filing by working with a CPA and getting all necessary documentation organized for the accountant.

### Business Value
- **Compliance** - Meet tax filing deadlines and avoid penalties
- **Financial Health** - Proper tax planning and optimization
- **Peace of Mind** - Reduce stress and anxiety around tax season
- **Professional Growth** - Establish relationship with CPA for ongoing tax planning

---

## ðŸ”¥ Key Deliverables

### Phase 1: TurboTax CPA Setup (Week 1)
- [ ] **TurboTax CPA Service** - Use TurboTax's integrated CPA service for convenience
- [ ] **Account Setup** - Create TurboTax account and select CPA service level
- [ ] **Initial Consultation** - Schedule virtual meeting with assigned TurboTax CPA
- [ ] **Documentation Upload** - Upload all tax documents to TurboTax platform

### Phase 2: Document Collection (Week 2)
- [ ] **W-2 Forms** - Collect all W-2 forms from Freddie Mac
- [ ] **1099 Forms** - Gather all 1099 forms from freelance/consulting work
- [ ] **Business Income** - Document all SaaS product revenue and business income
- [ ] **Business Expenses** - Compile all business-related expenses and receipts
- [ ] **Investment Records** - Gather investment account statements and transactions
- [ ] **Property Records** - Collect mortgage statements, property tax records
- [ ] **Medical Expenses** - Compile medical bills and insurance records
- [ ] **Charitable Contributions** - Document all charitable donations

### Phase 3: Tax Preparation (Week 3-4)
- [ ] **TurboTax CPA Review** - CPA reviews all documentation and prepares tax returns
- [ ] **Virtual Consultation** - Meet with TurboTax CPA for tax planning discussion
- [ ] **Quarterly Estimates** - Set up quarterly estimated tax payments if needed
- [ ] **Electronic Filing** - Complete and file all required tax returns through TurboTax

---
